column4: hey all, I'm having some trouble installing ubuntu on my laptop, when I try to install it it halts and drops me into a terminal Busy Box 1.3 (initramfs)
I think it can't find a filesystem, I previously installed OpenSuse, then deleted the partition, I think my .mbr is gone.
can I restore that with my Vista CD?
try ask that question in the windows channel; fdisk /mbr  might do the trick?
